content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":218152,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物将軍ダルソン様！","translatedEnglishLine":"General of the Monsters, Darson-sama!"},{"lineNumber":218153,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、むう……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mm, mmm... ?\""},{"lineNumber":218154,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……既に、人類と魔軍が戦った","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Already, the Second Demon War where humans and demon armies fought"},{"lineNumber":218155,"originalJapaneseLine":"　第2次魔人戦争は15年前に終結致しました」","translatedEnglishLine":"has concluded 15 years ago.\""},{"lineNumber":218156,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私達はもう戦う必要はありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We no longer need to fight.\""},{"lineNumber":218157,"originalJapaneseLine":"「皆さんがこの都市を返却して頂ければ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you all return this city,"},{"lineNumber":218158,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私が必ずや皆さんを魔物界まで","translatedEnglishLine":"I will surely arrange for all of you"},{"lineNumber":218159,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無事に帰還できるよう取り計らいます」","translatedEnglishLine":"to safely return to the Monster World.\""},{"lineNumber":218160,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ですからお願いです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Therefore, I beg you,"},{"lineNumber":218161,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうか武器を収めて下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"please lay down your weapons.\""},{"lineNumber":218162,"originalJapaneseLine":"「将軍も、将軍の部下の皆さんも、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The General, your subordinates,"},{"lineNumber":218163,"originalJapaneseLine":"　皆さんの家族も、もうこれ以上、","translatedEnglishLine":"and all your families—no longer"},{"lineNumber":218164,"originalJapaneseLine":"　苦しまなくていいのです」","translatedEnglishLine":"need to suffer any longer.\""},{"lineNumber":218165,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうか……お願いです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please... I beg you."},{"lineNumber":218166,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私の言葉を信じて下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Believe in my words.\""},{"lineNumber":218167,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセットがその小さな体を折り曲げ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset bent her small body,"},{"lineNumber":218168,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵兵達に頭を下げて懇願する。","translatedEnglishLine":"and bowed her head pleadingly to the enemy soldiers."},{"lineNumber":218169,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":218170,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、ダルソン将軍……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"G-General Darson...\""},{"lineNumber":218171,"originalJapaneseLine":"部下の魔物隊長アレコズインが","translatedEnglishLine":"Alekozine, the monster squad leader and subordinate,"},{"lineNumber":218172,"originalJapaneseLine":"将軍を見つめる。","translatedEnglishLine":"looked at the General."},{"lineNumber":218173,"originalJapaneseLine":"その瞳には正気に戻って欲しいという","translatedEnglishLine":"In his eyes was the desire for him to regain sanity."},{"lineNumber":218174,"originalJapaneseLine":"思いが込められていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"That hope was deeply felt."},{"lineNumber":218175,"originalJapaneseLine":"「副官アレコズインよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Vice Commander Alekozine..."},{"lineNumber":218176,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes!\""},{"lineNumber":218177,"originalJapaneseLine":"「彼らの言葉は真だと思うかね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do you think their words are true?\""},{"lineNumber":218178,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、くっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":218179,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":218180,"originalJapaneseLine":"数秒だけ顔を歪ませ、","translatedEnglishLine":"He distorted his face for a few seconds,"},{"lineNumber":218181,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし副官アレコズインは顔を上げて答える。","translatedEnglishLine":"but Vice Commander Alekozine looked up and answered."},{"lineNumber":218182,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いえ……真っ赤な偽りと存じます」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No... I believe it to be a blatant lie.\""},{"lineNumber":218183,"originalJapaneseLine":"「当然だ！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course it is!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":218184,"originalJapaneseLine":"「百歩譲って戦争終結を認めたとしよう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's assume for a moment the war has ended!"},{"lineNumber":218185,"originalJapaneseLine":"ならば、何故ここにいるのが人間なのだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Then why are there humans here?"},{"lineNumber":218186,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それを知らせに来るのは魔軍でなければならん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It must be the demon army who comes to inform us!\""},{"lineNumber":218187,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔軍は絶対に負けたりはしないぃいいいぃ〜〜！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The demon army will NEVER lose~~!\""},{"lineNumber":218188,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そのような虚言を信じろなどとは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To believe in such lies,"},{"lineNumber":218189,"originalJapaneseLine":"それもこのような子供を使い","translatedEnglishLine":"and to use such a child to..."},{"lineNumber":218190,"originalJapaneseLine":"我らを謀ろうとするとは……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"try to deceive us...!\""},{"lineNumber":218191,"originalJapaneseLine":"「許せん！　許せん！　許せん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Unforgivable! Unforgivable! Unforgivable!\""},{"lineNumber":218192,"originalJapaneseLine":"「許せんぞぉおぉおおおぉぉ〜〜！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will NOT forgive youuuu!!!\""},{"lineNumber":218193,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ああ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah...\""},{"lineNumber":218194,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははは！　やーい、説得失敗してやんのー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha! Yo, you failed to persuade them!\""},{"lineNumber":218195,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんでお前は嬉しそうなんだよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why do you look so happy about it!\""},{"lineNumber":218196,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハンッ！　嬉しいに決まってんだろ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph! Of course I'm happy!"},{"lineNumber":218197,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦争にとらわれた亡霊退治だぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We're hunting down the ghosts trapped by war!\""},{"lineNumber":218198,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザンスがバイ・ロードを抜き放つ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Zans unsheathed his Bye-Road sword."},{"lineNumber":218199,"originalJapaneseLine":"「総員！　突撃ィィィイイイーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone! Chargeeeeee!\""},{"lineNumber":218200,"originalJapaneseLine":"「叩き伏せるぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We'll knock them down!\""},{"lineNumber":218201,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐぬぬぬ……ッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gnununu...!\""},{"lineNumber":218202,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、まだだ！　まだ我らは負けん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-not yet! We will not lose yet!\""},{"lineNumber":218203,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんちゅうしぶとさだ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what tenacity... they're like immortal.\""},{"lineNumber":218204,"originalJapaneseLine":"まるで不死身だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"They're practically invincible.\""},{"lineNumber":218205,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これ以上、私の目の前で","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I won't allow"},{"lineNumber":218206,"originalJapaneseLine":"私の部下を殺させはせんぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"any more of my subordinates to be killed before my eyes!\""},{"lineNumber":218207,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐうっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guh...!\""},{"lineNumber":218208,"originalJapaneseLine":"体を支えていた気力すら途絶えたのか、","translatedEnglishLine":"Perhaps even the will to support his body had vanished,"},{"lineNumber":218209,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍ダルソンはその場に膝をついた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Monster General Darson knelt down on the spot."},{"lineNumber":218210,"originalJapaneseLine":"「将軍！　大丈夫ですか、将軍！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"General! Are you okay, General!?\""},{"lineNumber":218211,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふ、副官アレコズインよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"V-Vice Commander Alekozine...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍ダルソン様！
「……既に、人類と魔軍が戦った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Already, the Second Demon War where humans and demon armies fought

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第2次魔人戦争は15年前に終結致しました」
「私達はもう戦う必要はありません」
「皆さんがこの都市を返却して頂ければ、
私が必ずや皆さんを魔物界まで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will surely arrange for all of you

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無事に帰還できるよう取り計らいます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to safely return to the Monster World."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ですからお願いです」
「どうか武器を収めて下さい」
「将軍も、将軍の部下の皆さんも、
皆さんの家族も、もうこれ以上、
苦しまなくていいのです」
「どうか……お願いです。
私の言葉を信じて下さい」
リセットがその小さな体を折り曲げ、
敵兵達に頭を下げて懇願する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and bowed her head pleadingly to the enemy soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、ダルソン将軍……」
部下の魔物隊長アレコズインが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alekozine, the monster squad leader and subordinate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍を見つめる。
その瞳には正気に戻って欲しいという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In his eyes was the desire for him to regain sanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思いが込められていた。
「副官アレコズインよ……」
「は、はっ！」
「彼らの言葉は真だと思うかね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you think their words are true?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数秒だけ顔を歪ませ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He distorted his face for a few seconds,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし副官アレコズインは顔を上げて答える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Vice Commander Alekozine looked up and answered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いえ……真っ赤な偽りと存じます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No... I believe it to be a blatant lie."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「百歩譲って戦争終結を認めたとしよう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's assume for a moment the war has ended!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ならば、何故ここにいるのが人間なのだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then why are there humans here?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを知らせに来るのは魔軍でなければならん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It must be the demon army who comes to inform us!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍は絶対に負けたりはしないぃいいいぃ〜〜！」
「そのような虚言を信じろなどとは、
それもこのような子供を使い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and to use such a child to...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我らを謀ろうとするとは……！」
「許せん！　許せん！　許せん！」
「許せんぞぉおぉおおおぉぉ〜〜！！！！」
「がはははは！　やーい、説得失敗してやんのー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha! Yo, you failed to persuade them!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでお前は嬉しそうなんだよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why do you look so happy about it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハンッ！　嬉しいに決まってんだろ！
戦争にとらわれた亡霊退治だぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're hunting down the ghosts trapped by war!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスがバイ・ロードを抜き放つ。
「総員！　突撃ィィィイイイーーーー！」
「叩き伏せるぞ！」
「ぐぬぬぬ……ッ！」
「ま、まだだ！　まだ我らは負けん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-not yet! We will not lose yet!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんちゅうしぶとさだ……
まるで不死身だな」
「これ以上、私の目の前で
私の部下を殺させはせんぞー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: any more of my subordinates to be killed before my eyes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体を支えていた気力すら途絶えたのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps even the will to support his body had vanished,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍ダルソンはその場に膝をついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster General Darson knelt down on the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍！　大丈夫ですか、将軍！？」
「ふ、副官アレコズインよ……

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Already, the Second Demon War where humans and demon armies fought

まるで不死身だな」
「これ以上、私の目の前で
私の部下を殺させはせんぞー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: any more of my subordinates to be killed before my eyes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体を支えていた気力すら途絶えたのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps even the will to support his body had vanished,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍ダルソンはその場に膝をついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster General Darson knelt down on the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍！　大丈夫ですか、将軍！？」
「ふ、副官アレコズインよ……
